name: todoist---enough
title: ToDoist - Enough
description: Enough shows your completed Todoist tasks for the day, so you can focus on what you've accomplished, not what you have left.
author: pjtat5

commands.name: see-daily-completed-tasks
commands.title: See Daily Completed Tasks
commands.subtitle: What have you done today?
commands.description: Shows your completed Todoist tasks for the day

commands.name: see-weekly-completed-tasks
commands.title: See Weekly Completed Tasks
commands.subtitle: What have you done this week?
commands.description: Shows your completed Todoist tasks for the week

preferences.name: todoistApiToken
preferences.title: Todoist API Token
preferences.description: Your Todoist API token (found in Todoist Settings > Integrations > API token)

preferences.name: enableDailyTaskTarget
preferences.title: Enable Daily Task Target
preferences.description: Show progress towards daily task completion target

preferences.name: dailyTaskTarget
preferences.title: Daily Task Target
preferences.description: Number of tasks you aim to complete each day

preferences.name: enableWeeklyTaskTarget
preferences.title: Enable Weekly Task Target
preferences.description: Show progress towards weekly task completion target

preferences.name: weeklyTaskTarget
preferences.title: Weekly Task Target
preferences.description: Number of tasks you aim to complete each week

preferences.name: enableDailyStoryPointsTarget
preferences.title: Enable Daily Story Points Target
preferences.description: Show progress towards daily story points completion target

preferences.name: storyPointsKeyword
preferences.title: Story Points Keyword
preferences.description: The keyword to look for in labels to identify story points (e.g., 'Story Points:')

preferences.name: dailyStoryPointsTarget
preferences.title: Daily Story Points Target
preferences.description: Your target number of story points to complete each day

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
